H0.text: Eye color is a trait that a human most directly inherits from its parents.

H1.text: Musical taste is a trait that a human most directly inherits from its parents.

H2.text: Career choice is a trait a human most directly inherits from its parents.

H3.text: Interest in reading is a trait that a human most directly inherits from its parents.

A4.text: Eye color is an inherited trait determined by multiple genes.

A5.text: Eye color inheritance is now recognized as a polygenic trait, meaning that it is controlled by the interactions of several genes.
